explanation: The stage direction 'Elles ont achevé de mettre la table, et elles viennent sur le devant de la scène' describes the characters' movement towards the front of the stage after completing an action. Although part of the description involves finishing setting the table, the crucial action here is their movement to another part of the stage.
stgdir: Elles ont achevé de mettre la table, et elles viennent sur le devant de la scène.
